title: Question about Valentine's skins
body:
Hello! I've only been playing since ~march of this year, so I wasn't here for any of the Valentine's skins. Do they come back each year for purchase or are they only available when first released? I got Sweetheart Annie in my shop but Sweetheart Sona and Heartseeker Quinn are my favorite skins in the game! Thanks for the help! <3
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body: These skins are[ legacy skins](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins), so they will come back at some point in the store.  When they're not on sale, you can also find them in hextech crafting or mystery skins!

I want sweetheart sona as well ;;

They might comeback in Feb 2018--
